summary: This document is an email correspondence primarily between Tazia Smith and Amanda Kirby regarding a meeting agenda and account summaries. It includes discussions about account holdings and preparations for an upcoming meeting, indicating a professional relationship focused on financial matters.

keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 21, 2013.
Tazia Smith expresses gratitude to Amanda Kirby for consolidating information for a meeting.
The email discusses account holdings and preparations for a meeting scheduled for October 22, 2013.
Attachments referenced in the email include account summaries and images, though they are not included in the text.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
